acf.heading: Get a meloxicam prescription online.
acf.first_paragraph: Arthritis can not only be painful, but can worsen over time and impact your quality of life if not treated.

accordion.accordion_title: What is meloxicam and how does it work?
accordion.accordion_intro: Meloxicam (sold under the brand name Mobic) is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug primarily used to treat arthritis. It reduces the pain and swelling in joints by blocking enzymes that cause such reactions.

accordion.accordion_title: What are the uses for meloxicam?
accordion.accordion_intro: Meloxicam is used to treat arthritis. It reduces pain and swelling caused in the joints as a result of arthritis.

Meloxicam should be taken as per doctor’s recommendation. It comes primarily in two forms: oral suspension and tablets. The size of the dosage varies based on the severity of the arthritis, but typically ranges from 5mg to 15mg. Meloxicam is taken once a day with a full glass of water

accordion.accordion_title: What are the side effects and risks of meloxicam?
accordion.accordion_content: Additionally, it may cause an increase in blood pressure; check your blood pressure regularly.. If any of these side effects worsen or persist, stop taking meloxicam and contact your doctor.

accordion.accordion_intro:
Meloxicam may contain active ingredients to which you may be allergic. Also, those with a history of gastrointestinal ulcers or bleeding should use extreme caution before deciding to take Meloxicam, Consult with a doctor before using meloxicam.

If you are experiencing symptoms of arthritis, speak to a doctor here on Maple to see if meloxicam is right for you.
